title.en: Yuusha Shoukan ni Makikomareta kedo, Isekai wa Heiwa deshita

altTitles.ja: 勇者召喚に巻き込まれたけど、異世界は平和でした

altTitles.en: I Got Caught Up in a Hero Summons, but the Other World was at Peace!

description.en:
The other world was… at Peace.  
A kind world where the three races, the Spirit World’s Magical Races, the Celestial World’s Divine Races, the Human World’s Human Races, they are kind neighbours to each other, with everyone living a peaceful and fulfilling life.  
  
But although I wished to peacefully spend a year before my return, for some reason, the heavyweights of this world keeps gathering around me, and…
description.ja: 心に陰を落とす青年、快人が飛ばされたのは争いのない「平和な異世界」だった！？魔族の少女、クロムエイナとの出会いをきっかけに動き始める、異世界成長記録。
description.pt-br:
O outro mundo estava... em paz. Um mundo gentil onde as três raças, as raças mágicas do Mundo Espiritual, as raças divinas do Mundo Celestial e as raças humanas do Mundo Humano, são vizinhos gentis entre si, com todos vivendo uma vida pacífica e plena.

Mas, embora eu desejasse passar um ano em paz antes de retornar, por algum motivo, os poderosos deste mundo continuam se reunindo ao meu redor e...

title.en: Unmei no Hito ni Deau Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 運命の人に出会う話

altTitles.pt-br: Você É Aquele Que Eu Estou Destinada A Me Apaixonar

description.en: Yuuki is a 20-year-old college sophomore who has wished for one thing since moving to Tokyo: to find her soulmate. Growing a bit desperate after a long drought, she goes along with a friend to a club for the first time. Her friend thrives, but it’s chaotic and loud…just not Yuuki’s scene. Just when Yuuki begins to despair that she’ll ever find a real, adult relationship, she meets Iori, a man with bleached hair and a slightly scary demeanor…but first impressions don’t always tell the whole story. Could destiny still have more cards to play? [Kodansha]
description.pt-br: Honda Yuuki é uma estudante que vive sozinha pela primeira vez depois de deixar o campo há dois anos. Agora que ela tem 20 anos, tudo que ela realmente quer é encontrar alguém por quem se apaixonar! Mas o destino realmente existe? Enquanto ela pensa em como encontrar o homem dos seus sonhos, sua melhor amiga a leva para um determinado lugar.

altTitles.ja: 黄昏乙女×アムネジア

altTitles.vi: Xử nữ hoàng hôn và Amnesia

description.en:
Legend states that the ghost of a student who died at Seikyou Private Academy still haunts the grounds to this day... A truth that first year student Teiichi uncovers when he stumbles into that very ghost, Yuuko! However, with no memories of her previous life, she enlists the help of Teiichi and opens a paranormal investigations club to unravel the school’s ghastly mysteries.

(Source: Manga UP! Global)

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/t9hf4kQ.png) [Official Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/cot/circle/2UPA116P847KdC6Rd687/all/)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/lGJEbPa.png) [Official DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/circle/profile/=/maker_id/RG40614.html) (jp)
description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

altTitles.th: ชมรมรั่วมหากาฬ!

altTitles.ja: デーフラグ！
ディーふらぐ!

description.en:
Kazama Kenji likes to believe he is something of a delinquent. Moreover, others seem to like to agree that he is. Of course, Kenji's gang finds their way to a group of four not-so-normal girls - Chitose, Sakura, Minami and Roka - and all at once, whatever reputation he may have, is nothing compared to the outrageous behavior of the girls. Shanghaied into joining their club, what will happen to his everyday life from that point on?  


---
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=15705)
description.ru: Печально известный главарь банды Казама Кенжи наталкивается на группу странных девчонок, воображающих, что они владеют магией стихий. В итоге девчонки шантажируют его, чтобы он вступил в их клуб. Итак, приключения начинаются…
description.pt-br: Kazama Kenji acredita que ele é mais ou menos um delinquente. Além disso, outras pessoas parecem acreditar que ele é. Claro, a gangue do Kenji se encontra com um grupo de quatro garotas nada normais—Chitose, Sakura, Minami e Roka—de uma vez só, qualquer reputação que ele tenha não é nada comparado ao comportamento escandaloso das garotas. Forçados a se juntarem ao grupo delas, o que acontecerá com o seu dia-a-dia apartir de agora?

altTitles.en: メテオさんストライクです!

description.en:
Everyone lies when they are young, but the lie Kobayashi Hiro told when he was just six haunts him daily to this day. He claimed that he was abducted by aliens, and, even though it was quickly discovered it was a hoax, thanks to national attention, the town became a hotspot and tourist stop for UFO fanatics.  
  
So when the beautiful Yamada Meteor transfers to Hiro’s school, claiming that she is an alien and Hiro is the only one that can save the planet from destruction, he thinks that the whole thing’s a prank. He quickly learns that she isn’t joking.  
  
Meteor is here to test if humanity is worth saving from the monstrous asteroids headed toward Earth. To prove humanity’s worth to the universe, Hiro must complete the assigned missions, even if they are a little perverted.

“R“ or rather Room 402 is the room where our illustrious female main character lives. One day which seems to be by mere coincidence her fate intertwines with that of Sasamoto, a savvy man who seems to be down in the dumps. That is until he picks up a trinket which fell from her nether regions. Prepare yourself for a story of sexual psychological horror as Sasamoto enters into a brave new world.

altTitles.ja: ハヤテのごとく！

description.en:
Ayasaki Hayate, 16, the world's unluckiest boy.  
Working hard as a child for food and school fees, his unemployed and indebted parents sold him to the yakuza for his internal organs. After temporarily escaping the criminals and contemplating the benefits of a life of crime, he was saved by a wealthy young girl, who now employs him as a live-in butler.
Strange bunny girls have been appearing all over the city, attempting to recruit people into a mysterious cult known as "The Warren Divine".

altTitles.ja: ヴァルキリープロファイル - Enix Supercomic Gekijoh

description.en: A manga anthology, based on the first Valkyrie Profile role-playing game "Lenneth". It's a collection of shortstories by various mangaka.
Sequel to Blood Rain (Min)

title.en: Elden Ring: The Road to the Erdtree

altTitles.ja: ELDEN RING　黄金樹への道

altTitles.ja-ro: ELDEN RING: Ougonju e no Michi
ELDEN RING: Ougonju he no Michi

altTitles.en: ELDEN RING: Road to the Goldtree
ELDEN RING　The Road to the Erdtree

altTitles.de: Elden Ring: Der Weg zum Erdenbaum

altTitles.ru: Кольцо Элден: Дорога к древу Эрд

description.de:
Die Geschichte spielt in der Welt des Games Elden Ring. Der große Eldenring wurde zerschlagen und die Halbgötter haben die einzelnen Fragmente an sich genommen. Nun herrscht ein schrecklicher Krieg im Zwischenland, bei dem jeder versucht, an die Fragmente der anderen zu gelangen. In dieser Zeit taucht ein unbekannter Befleckter auf, dem die Last aufgetragen wird, die Halbgötter zu unterwerfen und den Titel als Eldenfürst einzufordern... Doch selbst wenn der Befleckte dieser Aufgabe gewachsen wäre, will er den Titel überhaupt?

Eine Geschichte in der Welt von Elden Ring, die nicht nur den harten Fans gefallen wird, sondern für jeden ist, der unbedingt neuen Dark-Fantasy-Lesestoff benötigt, vor allem, wenn er wie hier mit der ein oder anderen Prise Humor bestückt ist.

---
**Note:** Aside from the original Japanese, this series is being published digitally as a [simulpub](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-09-04/new-elden-ring-gag-manga-launches-with-publication-in-12-languages/.189310) in English, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Italian, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, European Spanish, Latin American Spanish, and Thai.

---
**Original Web Publication** [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF09203323010000_68), [NicoVideo](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/60075)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF09203324020000_68)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.kadokawa.com.tw/blogs/news/20220904)
* [German / Deutsch](https://altraverse.de/aktuell/elden-ring-der-weg-zum-erdenbaum-im-simulpub-bei-altraverse)
description.en:
Aseo, a poor, Tarnished wretch, finds himself cast out into Limgrave—naked, penniless, hopeless, and maidenless. His only hope in his harsh, unforgiving new home is a mysterious woman named Melina. She urges him to follow the guidance of grace to the Erdtree that looms over the Lands Between. But it won't be an easy road; a cast of colorful characters awaits Aseo along the way—Patches the Untethered, Blaidd the Half-Wolf, Margit the Fell Omen, Godrick the Grafted, and of course, Ranni the Witch... With little but a loincloth between Aseo and certain death, he strikes out for the first stop on his quest: Stormveil Castle. Will he make it there, or will his journey end before it even begins?

---
**Note:** Aside from the original Japanese, this series is being digitally simulpubbed in English, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Italian, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Spanish, Latin American Spanish, and Thai. ([ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-09-04/new-elden-ring-gag-manga-launches-with-publication-in-12-languages/.189310))
___
[Alt Official English (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/elden-ring-the-road-to-the-erdtree)
description.ja:
素寒貧で狭間の地・リムグレイブへ放り出された褪せ人・褪夫（あせお）。狭間の地の過酷さに心が折れかけた褪夫は、謎の少女・メリナに取引を持ちかけられ、祝福の導きに従って黄金樹を目指すことに。褪夫の行く手には次々に個性豊かすぎる人物たちが待ち受ける。フーテンのパッチ、半狼のブライブ、忌み鬼マルギット、接ぎ木のゴドリック、そして魔女ラニ……。命からがらリムグレイブを旅する褪夫は、当面の目的地・ストームヴィル城にたどり着けるのか－－!?

世界累計1660万本突破（2022年6月末時点）の大ヒットアクションRPG『ELDEN RING』を『邪剣さんはすぐブレる』の飛田ニキイチが禁断のコミカライズ!!

---
**Note:** Aside from the original Japanese, this series is being published digitally as a [simulpub](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-09-04/new-elden-ring-gag-manga-launches-with-publication-in-12-languages/.189310) in English, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Italian, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, European Spanish, Latin American Spanish, and Thai.

---
**Original Web Publication** [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF09203323010000_68), [NicoVideo](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/60075)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF09203324020000_68)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.kadokawa.com.tw/blogs/news/20220904)
* [German / Deutsch](https://altraverse.de/aktuell/elden-ring-der-weg-zum-erdenbaum-im-simulpub-bei-altraverse)
description.ru: Асео, нищая душа, бедный и потускневший негодяй, оказывается брошенным в Замогилье — голым, без гроша в кармане, безнадежным. Его единственная надежда в его суровом, неумолимом новом доме — таинственная женщина по имени Мелина. Она убеждает его следовать указаниям благодати к Древу Эрд, которое нависает над Землями Междуземье. Но это будет нелегкий путь. Асео по пути ждет множество красочных персонажей: Отвязанный Лоскутик, Полуволк Блайдд, Маргит Ужасное Знамение, Годрик Сторукий и, конечно же, ведьма Ренни... Учитвая что между ним и Смертью всего лишь набедренная повязка, Асео отправляется на первую остановку в своем квесте: Замок Грозовой Завесы. Доберется ли он туда или его путешествие закончится, даже не начавшись?
description.zh-hk:
褪色者──褪夫一貧如洗地被丟到交界地：寧姆格福。
交界地那嚴苛至極的環境讓褪夫氣餒不已，此時謎之少女梅琳娜對他提出條件，要他順從賜福的指引前往黃金樹。褪夫的旅途將有多采多姿的個性人物等待著他，進行著九死一生旅程的褪夫目前的目的地，是前往斷崖之城史東薇爾──！？

---
**Note:** Aside from the original Japanese, this series is being published digitally as a [simulpub](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-09-04/new-elden-ring-gag-manga-launches-with-publication-in-12-languages/.189310) in English, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Italian, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, European Spanish, Latin American Spanish, and Thai.

---
**Original Web Publication** [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF09203323010000_68), [NicoVideo](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/60075)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF09203324020000_68)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.kadokawa.com.tw/blogs/news/20220904)
* [German / Deutsch](https://altraverse.de/aktuell/elden-ring-der-weg-zum-erdenbaum-im-simulpub-bei-altraverse)

altTitles.ja: 獣王と薬草

description.en: Dungeons are the stuff of dreams—defeat the monsters, take their loot, and then venture into uncharted territory to discover hidden riches! Tina, an upstart adventurer with just such a dream, ends up mortally wounded while exploring a dungeon. Suddenly, the great demon known as the Beast King Garon, who was supposed to have been slain by a hero in the distant past, appears before her!  Dungeon fantasy meets medical drama!
description.ru:
Подземелья - это воплощение мечты…
Собирайте материалы с поверженных монстров,
добирайтесь до неисследованных мест и завладевайте сокровищами!
Тина, авантюристка, мечтает о таком успехе,
Исследуя подземелье, она получает тяжелое ранение.
Перед ней появляется сильнейший демон «Король зверей Гарон», когда-то в прошлом он должен был быть убит героем?..

Фэнтези и медицинская драма по мотивам подземелья от Konda Tatsukazu, автора оригинальной истории «Ginrou Bloodborne/Серебряный волк, рожденный в крови», начинается!

description.en: Jongli Chu, a warrior of the Death Heavenly Sect who killed Hwang Jung to avenge his older brother. In order to avoid the pursuit of Death Heavenly Sect, he looked to an assassin of the Death Soul Agency, Crimson Assassin, for help and got swept into a huge mess known as the Obliteration. In order to escape the shadow of the Obliteration, he had no choice but to become a legendary Death God! Can Jong Lichu become a Death God and find freedom in the stifling rules created by the orthodox sects?

altTitles.ja: 甘い生活

description.en:
The complicated story of a young man who goes to work for a lingerie company. 
One of the very first harem manga, done by a former shojo mangaka known for his peculiar tendencies 
(was known to cross dress among other things) and serialized in the now defunct Business Jump.
 
Volume titles and Romaji equivalent:

- ベガスの狂乱 (Vegas no Kyōran)  
- 1000万ドルの下着 (1000 Man-doru no Shitagi)  
- 幼なじみの下着 (Osana Najimi no Shitagi)  
- 呪いのコルセット発動！？ (Noroi no Corset Hatsudō!?)

Kang Hyeon, who was ashamed of his poor family, cut off ties with those around him and studied desperately to achieve success, but eventually he realized that his ideals were wrong.
To make matters worse, Hyeon, who has cancer, gets run over while trying to save someone who fell on the subway tracks, and returns to the past while listening to the melody of a symphony.
Hyeon, who was determined not to live the same life as before, realizes that he has tremendous musical talent...

title.en: The Artistic Genius of Music Is the Reincarnation of Paganini

altTitles.en: High School Musical Genius Is Paganini Reincarnated

description.en: The Rebirth of Paganini, Joo-won Moon. He was once a gifted violinist, but due to an injury, he gradually distanced himself from music and lived the life of a regular high school student. “I don’t pursue music.” However, perhaps the irony of fate… Joo-won Moon accidentally transferred to the music class of an arts high school, he picked up the violin… Will Joo-won Moon be able to overcome his psychological trauma? And is there a chance for him to be reborn as a true violinist?

title.en: I'm Really Not the Evil God's Lackey

altTitles.en: I'm Really Not the Demon God's Lackey
I’m Really Not the Devil’s Lackey

altTitles.uk: Насправді я не слуга Злого Бога

altTitles.vi: Ta Thật Không Phải Tà Thần Chó Săn

description.en: Lin Jie is an otherworlder who manages a bookstore. He’s kind and always recommends soul-healing books for his dejected customers. Sometimes he’d even share his own works too. As time goes on, these customers start to respect him a lot. They bring simple local products every day to show their gratitude and ask for book recommendations. They even start telling tales of this ordinary shopkeeper. His respectful and cordial titles include “Hyena of the Evil God”, “Herald of the Flesh Gospel”, “Author of Cultes des Goules” and “Shepherd of the Stars”???
description.uk: Лінь Цзє – чужоземець з іншого світу, що став тепер звичайним власником книжкового магазину. Він доброзичливий і завжди готовий порекомендувати відвідувачам книги, що здатні зцілити їхні душі. Іноді, він ділиться і власними роботами. З часом, клієнти починають його дуже поважати. Вони щодня приносять йому маленькі сувеніри чи подарунки в знак подяки та просять у нього рекомендації щодо книги. Про цього звичайного крамаря навіть починають розповідати історії. Його з повагою та теплом звуть «Гієна Злого Бога», «Вісник Євангелія Плоті», «Автор Культу Упирів» та «Пастух Зірок».
description.zh: 穿越者林介经营着一家书店。他善良热情，总是向失意潦倒的客人们推荐治愈心灵的书籍，偶尔也会安利一下自己的拙作。久而久之，这些客人变得非常尊敬他，每天都会带来一些朴实的土特产报答他，向他请教推荐书目，并且向周边人也诉说着这个普通书店老板的事迹。他们尊敬而亲切地称呼他为——“邪神的鬣狗”、“血肉福音书的传播者”、“尸食教典仪的撰写者”、“群星的牧羊人”。“？？？”

altTitles.en: It's Voice Phishing, but It's a Life Reversal
Voice Phishing Turns Your Life Around

description.en: A place where you casually use blood or ma in your name, I lived in Murim for 7 years. I was miserable, and I did a lot of dirty things. But I had to do anything to survive. That's 'Nangin' Finally, I crossed the line and experienced death in a desire to become stronger. But when I opened my eyes, it was modern. The world has changed and we are connected to the fantasy world of Pangea?! And as a returner with the only class? Let's scratch the lottery tickets!
description.id: Tempat di mana Anda dengan santai menggunakan darah atau ma atas nama Anda, saya tinggal di Murim selama 7 tahun. Saya sengsara, dan saya melakukan banyak hal kotor. Tapi aku harus melakukan apapun untuk bertahan hidup. Itulah 'Nangin' Akhirnya, saya melewati batas dan mengalami kematian dalam keinginan untuk menjadi lebih kuat. Tapi ketika saya membuka mata saya, itu modern. Dunia telah berubah dan kita terhubung dengan dunia fantasi Pangaea?! Dan sebagai pengembalian dengan satu-satunya kelas? Mari gores tiket lotere!

title.ja: Backstabbed in a Backwater Dungeon: My Party Tried to Kill Me, But Thanks to an Infinite Gacha I Got LVL 9999 Friends and Am Out For Revenge

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinjiteita Nakama Tachi Ni Dungeon Okuchi De Korosare Kaketa ga Gift 『Mugen Gacha』 De Level 9999 No Nakama Tachi Wo Te Ni Irete Moto Party Member To Sekai Ni Fukushu & 『Zamaa!』 Shimasu!

altTitles.ja: 信じていた仲間達にダンジョン奥地で殺されかけたがギフト『無限ガチャ』でレベル9999の仲間達を手に入れて元パーティーメンバーと世界に復讐&『ざまぁ!』します!

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinjiteita Nakamatachi ni Dungeon Ouchi de Korosarekaketa ga Gift "Mugen Gacha" de Level 9999 no Nakamatachi wo Te ni Irete Moto Party Member to Sekai ni Fukushuu & "Zamaa!" Shimasu!

altTitles.en: Backwater Dungeon: My Party Tried to Kill Me, But Thanks to an Infinite Gacha I Got LVL 9999 Friends and Am Out For Revenge

I Was Almost Killed By The Teammates I trust Inside A Dungeon, And Gained A Gift Called [Infinite Gacha] And Level 9999 Comrades, And Now I'll Take Revenge Against My Former Teammates And The World, That's What You Get!
Backstabbed in a Backwater Dungeon: My Party Tried to Kill Me, But Thanks to an Infinite Gacha I Got LVL 9999 Friends and Am Out For Revenge

description.en:
There are six races in this world: human, beast, dragon, elf, dwarf, and demon. Humans are discriminated against and looked down on as the most inferior race. The "Gathering of Races" was a party with members from each race gathered to dispel such discrimination, but they also had a hidden purpose. They were ordered by the non-human countries to search for the human "Master," and take it to their own country.

Light, a human boy with the gift "Infinite Gacha," was welcomed into the Gathering of Races as he was suspected of being a Master. But in the end, their investigation showed that Light was not a Master. Just as Light was about to be killed by his teammates, he accidentally stepped on a transfer trap and was teleported to the lowest level of the dungeon.

In the deepest dungeon, he was attacked by a mythical level 1000 demon. In a desperate situation, Light used "Infinite Gacha" repeatedly. Luckily, he draws the SUR level 9999 card "Mei the Seeker Maid." Mei helped Light repel the demons and saved his life.

After finally escaping from the crisis, Light decides to take revenge on his former comrades. Mei advises him to remain in the dungeon and use Infinite Gacha to increase his number of trustworthy friends. Light agreed began building up the power necessary to oppose the non-human nations.

Three years later, Light had built the strongest nation in the depths of the dungeon. Once again, he will return to the surface to take revenge on his former comrades and search for the truth that nearly killed him.
___
[Alt Official English (US ONLY)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10040/episode/345702)
description.ja:
仲間に裏切られ、最凶のダンジョン『奈落』の底に突き落とされた少年・ライト。彼に残されたのはゴミだと思われたスキル『無限ガチャ』のみ！　最悪な状況から少年の逆転劇が始まる!!!　

9つの種族の平等を掲げ結成された冒険者パーティー『種族の集い』。荷物持ちの少年・ライトは、パーティーの仲間達に裏切られ最凶ダンジョン『奈落』の奥で命を狙われる…。絶体絶命の危機、ライトがすがるのは恩恵『無限ガチャ』!!!
description.pt-br: Um menino chamado Light é traído por seus companheiros e mergulha no abismo da masmorra mais perigosa do mundo. Tudo o que ele têm é a Bênção (habilidade) "Gacha Infinita", que ele pensou ser um lixo! Começa a vingança de um garoto na pior situação possível!

title.en: My Friend's Little Sister Has It in for Me!

altTitles.en: My Friend's Little Sister is Annoying Only Towards Me

altTitles.id: Adik Perempuan Temanku Hanya Usil Kepadaku

altTitles.en: My Friend's Little Sister is Only Annoying to Me

altTitles.ru: Младшая сестрёнка моего друга пристает лишь ко мне

altTitles.ja: 友達の妹が俺にだけウザい

altTitles.ja-ro: Tomodachi no Imouto ga Ore ni Dake Uzai

altTitles.es-la: La hermana menor de mi mejor amigo solo es molesta conmigo

description.en:
I don’t need any deep relationships. I have no desire for a girlfriend, and I only require one friend who holds any value to me. Ever since I threw out my youth for the sake of efficiency, there is one person who keeps entering the bedroom of Ooboshi Akiteru. She’s neither my little sister nor my friend. She’s nothing more than a bothersome, annoying Kouhai, as well as my friend’s little sister: Kohinata Iroha. “Senpai, let’s go on a date~! Did you think I’d say that~?”. Rather than blood, it seems that energy drinks run through her veins. She keeps occupying my bed, and she tries her best to seduce me with whatever method she can play to her favor. She’s a girl who’s constantly annoying and obnoxious around me. Even though I’m busy all day long, she doesn’t care. And in case you’re wondering why all these envious gazes are directed at me, it’s because Iroha is actually really popular. She’s an honor student at our school with top grades to boot, and she’s known for being kind and proper to anyone she meets. …Hey now, why are you only so annoying when you’re around me?  

---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/imouza_PR)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Author’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/mikawaghost)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Manga Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/hiraminmi)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://ga.sbcr.jp/sp/imouza/)  
- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/s/my-friend-s-little-sister-has-it-in-for-me)  
- [Alternative Raw](https://www.ganganonline.com/contents/tomodachino)
description.pt: Não preciso de nenhum relacionamento profundo. Não desejo uma namorada, e só preciso de um amigo que tenha algum valor para mim. Desde que eu, Ooboshi Akiteru, joguei fora minha juventude por uma questão de eficiência, há uma pessoa que continua entrando no meu quarto. Ela não é minha irmãzinha nem minha amiga. Ela não passa de uma Kouhai chata e irritante, além da irmã mais nova do meu amigo: Kohinata Iroha. "Senpai, vamos a um encontro ~! Você achou que eu diria isso ~?". Em vez de sangue, parece que bebidas energéticas correm por suas veias. Ela continua ocupando minha cama e tenta ao máximo me seduzir com qualquer método que ela possa jogar a seu favor. Ela é uma garota que é constantemente irritante e desagradável ao meu redor. Embora eu esteja ocupada o dia todo, ela não se importa. E caso você esteja se perguntando por que todos esses olhares invejosos são direcionados para mim, é porque Iroha é realmente muito popular. Ela é uma aluna de honra da nossa escola com as melhores notas e é conhecida por ser gentil e adequada com qualquer pessoa que conhece. …Ei agora, por que você é tão irritante quando está perto de mim?
description.ru: Мне не нужны никакие глубокие отношения. У меня нет желания иметь подругу, и мне нужен только один друг, который имеет для меня хоть какую-то ценность. С тех пор как я бросил свою молодость ради эффективности, есть один человек, который продолжает входить в спальню Ообоши Акитеру. Она мне не младшая сестра и не подруга. Она не более чем надоедливый, раздражающий кохай, а также младшая сестра моего друга: Кохината Ироха. "Сэмпай, давай сходим на свидание! Неужели ты думал, что я так скажу?”. Кажется, что по ее венам текут не кровь, а энергетические напитки. Она по-прежнему занимает мою постель и изо всех сил старается соблазнить меня любым способом, который может сыграть ей на руку. Она - девушка, которая постоянно раздражает и раздражает меня. Хотя я весь день занят, ей все равно. И если вам интересно, почему все эти завистливые взгляды направлены на меня, это потому, что Ироха действительно очень популярна. Она почетная ученица в нашей школе с высшими оценками в придачу, и она известна своей добротой и порядочностью ко всем, кого она встречает. "Эй, почему ты так раздражаешь меня, только когда рядом со мной?"
description.es-la: No necesito una relación profunda. No tengo deseo por una novia, y solo requiero un amigo que tenga algún valor para mí. Desde que deseche mi juventud a favor de la eficiencia, hay una persona que sigue entrando al dormitorio de Ooboshi Akiteru. Ella no es mi hermanita o mi amiga. Ella no es nada más que una molestia, una molesta kouhai, así como la hermana pequeña de mi amigo: Kohinata Iroha. "¡Senpai, tengamos una cita! ¿Creíste que diría eso?" En vez de sangre, pareciera que una bebida energética corriera por sus venas. ella sigue ocupando mi cama, y ella da su mejor esfuerzo para seducirme con cualquier método que pueda usar a su favor. ella es una chica que es constantemente molesta y desagradable a mi alrededor. incluso si estoy ocupado todo el día, a ella no le importa. Y en caso de que te estés preguntando por que todas esas miradas envidiosas están dirigidas a mí, es porque Iroha es realmente popular. Ella es una estudiante de honor en nuestra escuela con las mejores calificaciones, y ella es conocida por ser amable y apropiada para cualquiera que ella conozca. Hey ahora, ¿Porque solo eres escandalosa cuando estas alrededor mío?

title.en: My Younger Sister Was a Genius

altTitles.en: My Younger Sibling Was a Genius

description.en: Yoon Hajoon, who struggled to pursue his musical career despite his iffy talents and ended up sacrificing his own family along the way, " If only I could turn back time...! " One day, after living with regrets and alcohol for a while, he woke up and found himself had returned to the past. Just then, it dawned on him. The fact that my younger sister is a musical genius...! Now is the time to turn my life around, that is by producing my younger sister into becoming the best singer!

altTitles.ja: めっちゃ召喚された件 THE COMIC

altTitles.en: Summoned to a parallel fantasy world many times

altTitles.ja-ro: Meccha Shoukan Sareta Ken THE COMIC

description.en:
Name’s Inori Takafuji. I’m not really much of a “go-getter,” if you catch my drift — sleep’s more my style — but getting summoned to another world kinda messed things up.

Bit hard to chill when you’ve got a king in your face telling you there’s a bad guy you’ve gotta go slay or whatever, you know? Plot twist, though — it’s actually not so bad. Getting the hero treatment sounds pretty nice, right?

But then it happens again! Some other clown summons me, I get my obligatory superpower, and off I go. And sure, that’s fine. It happens, sometimes you get isekai’d to the wrong place. But then it happens AGAIN! Someone ELSE summons me, I get ANOTHER superpower, and then I’m somewhere totally new.

Repeat ad nauseam.

No idea what’s going on, but all I want is one thing: stop !@#$ing summoning me!

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/oversummoned-overpowered-and-over-it)

title.en: Tobioriru Chokuzen no Doukyuusei ni "Sekkusu Shiyou! ” To Teianshite Mita.

altTitles.ja: 飛び降りる直前の同級生に『セックスしよう！』と提案してみた。

altTitles.id: Sesaat Sebelum Melompat, Aku menyarankan Teman Sekelasku, "Yuk, Ngewe!"

altTitles.en: Just Before Jumping, I Suggested to my Classmate, "Let's Have Sex!"

description.en:
A shocking romantic comedy has arrived! 
My first love, Koga Kurumi. Her beauty and personality, which are beyond what you'd expect from a high school student, invite jealousy, isolate her, and - she was on the verge of jumping off the roof due to bullying. So, what can I do...? 
"Let's have sex!" 
I'll scream out my love to the death and make a place for you in this world!
description.id: Dialah cinta pertamaku, Koga Kurumi. Kecantikan dan kepribadiannya di luar ekspektasi dari seorang murid SMA, membuat keirian, pengucilan,dan membuatnya hampir melompat dari atap sekolah karena perundungan. Lantas, apa yang bisa kulakukan? "Yuk, ngewe!". Akan kuteriakkan cintaku padamu hingga akhir nyawa dan membuatkanmu tempat di dunia ini!

title.en: Walking with Death: Start From Murloc Dungeons

altTitles.zh: 与死亡同行：从鱼人地下城开始

description.en: After unlocking the hidden job "Death Walker", it is only natural for me to become a legendary adventurer... right?

altTitles.ja: 鬼畜島

description.en: University students shipwrecked and forced to board a deserted island with a serial killer.

300 years ago, the invincible warrior Hyeon-oh Kim brought down the Tower of the End, preventing the world’s demise. Though he should have died the moment the Tower of the End collapsed, Hyeon-oh is reborn 300 years later in the body of a 17-year-old boy named Juhyeok Kim.

Meanwhile, he discovers the existence of the Constellations, who were once his disciples 300 years ago but were born during the time when he did not exist in this world. Will he be able to find them again and train them?

altTitles.ja: 世話やきキツネの仙狐さん

description.en:
Like many hardworking members of the workforce, Kuroto Nakano is perpetually stressed out by his job. Still, since he lives alone, he must carry on to sustain himself. Little do humans like Kuroto know, this stress takes the form of darkness residing within a person's body and will bring one's life to ruin.  
Fox deities can see this darkness and have the duty to save people before it is too late. To help rid Kuroto of his stress, Senko-san, an eight hundred-year-old foxgirl, volunteers to take care of him, and will do everything she can to ease the tension in his weary soul.

---

**Notes:**
- Despite initial serialization ending by November 2022, Comic Newtype announced on 9 February 2023 that the series would later resume publication.
description.ru: В повседневную жизнь Накано, работающего на «чёрную компанию», внезапно вторглась кицунэ Сэнко-сан (молодая жена 800 лет от роду). Будь то готовка, уборка или «особая забота» (чем бы это ни было), она исцелит его истощение своей нежной «заботой».
description.vi: Cuộc sống của Nakano, một nhân viên quèn làm công ăn lương, đã bị xáo trộn sau khi anh gặp một em hồ ly loli là Senko-san (800 tuổi).  Và thế là thanh niên FA có một con maid nấu ăn, lau chùi, dọn dẹp nhà cửa hộ và lo cho anh như con đẻ...
description.es-la: La vida cotidiana de Nanako, un hombre asalariado que trabaja en una compañía que lo explota, es repentinamente invadido por la Kitsune, Senko-san (800 años de edad- esposa joven). Ya sea cocina, limpieza o un servicio especial... Ella curará su agotamiento con su tierno cuidado.

altTitles.ja: チャラ男くんと清楚ちゃん
Charao-kun to Seiso-chan

altTitles.ja-ro: #Kuma to Usagi wa Tomodachide wa Irarenai

altTitles.ja: #クマとウサギは友達ではいられない

description.en:
A playboy goes after an innocent-seeming girl, having no idea what he's getting into.
___
**Note:** Not to be confused with [NoTR](https://mangadex.org/title/03346265-8076-4b14-8c80-78c2f04511be), another series from this same artist.

“I was given a building as an inheritance?”

From a nobody who does all kinds of odd jobs and lived a hard life, he was given a chance to become a landlord right in the middle of Gangnam!

But, the condition for this inheritance is to ‘operate a restaurant for 5 years.’

‘Moreover, I can sense a chill down my spine thanks to the weird customers that came in for today’s store opening……Do I really just need to prepare food?’

“So then…all the guests who came in yesterday…”

“They were ghosts.”

Every night starting from 11 o’ clock until 1 o’clock, we will now be open!

title.en: Shoukoku no Altair Gaiden - Toukoku no Subaru

altTitles.en: The Pleiades of the Island Nation

altTitles.ja: 将国のアルタイル嵬伝 嶌国のスバル

altTitles.vi: Sao Thất Nữ nơi Đảo quốc

description.en: The curtain rises on an Oriental Reconquista spin-off of Kato Kotono's "Shoukoku no Altair", set far to the east of Rumeliana is the once peaceful and beautiful island nation of Kusanagi, which has been annexed by the larger country of Cinili and fallen into ruin.

altTitles.en: The Demon Lord Levels Up With Martial Arts

description.en:
Now that the demonic realm and the heavenly realm have called a truce, the human world has returned to an era of peace.

Jeon Minchul lives the life of an ordinary college student until the day he comes across an artifact from the war and remembers — in his past life, he was the demon king who brought the world to its knees.

Upon recalling these memories, Minchul awakens his old powers, along with some new ones. But can this demon king harness the powers of both good and evil to protect the peace?
description.ko:
“마왕.”

그건.
인간이 되기 전, 전생의 나를 부르던 말이었다.

altTitles.ja: 見切りから始める我流剣術

description.en: Rio, a boy living in a remote village, attends the village dojo for self-defense, but gives up the idea that he cannot become stronger under the dojo’s teaching methods. However, the village is a dangerous place, and Rio decides to create his own way of fighting – “Garyu Kenjutsu” – in order to survive! A royal road fantasy of swords and magic is about to begin!

altTitles.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~From Trash Game Hunter to God-Tier Gamer!~

altTitles.ru: Рубеж Шангри-Ла: любитель игрошлака бросает вызов топ игре

altTitles.ja: シャングリラ・フロンティア　～クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす～

altTitles.zh-hk: 香格里拉・開拓異境～糞作獵手挑戰神作～

altTitles.ja-ro: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~

description.en:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
description.pt:
A adaptação cômica do romance superpopular de Syosetu Ni Narou.  
  
Hizutome Rakurou adora jogos de merda. Seu próximo desafio é Shangri-la Frontier, o jogo divino com uma base de jogadores total de 30.000.000. Reunindo companheiros (ralé) em um mundo expansivo e encontrando velhos inimigos pelo caminho, ele mudará o destino de cada jogador.
description.ru: Главный герой истории — лидер таблиц рейтинга в посредственных малоизвестных VR-играх (так называемый «игрошлак») которые, тем не менее, полностью его устраивают. Но однажды он решается бросить вызов сверхпопулярной игре с 30 миллионами активных пользователей под названием «Shangri-La Frontier». Адаптация суперпопулярного романа из "Shousetsuka ni Narou".

description.en: In the Immortal Realm, Jinyul was renowned as the Beauty Immortal, leading fashion trends and styles as the personal barber of the Jade Emperor. However, he, who was (literally) intoxicated by his high status, behaved recklessly and caused a major accident, completely shaving off the Jade Emperor’s hair. Enraged, the Jade Emperor banished him to the Mortal Realm. After falling into the Mortal Realm, Jinyul planned to regain his prowess and return to the Immortal Realm once again. But the moment he landed, things started going awry! Can Jinyul regain his status and return to his rightful place in the Immortal Realm?

title.en: In This Life, the Greatest Star in the Universe

altTitles.en: I'm Going to Be a Big Star

description.en: Sun Woo-joo, an aspiring idol with shining talent, dedication, and passion, had only one shortcoming: "dancing." Having to give up on his lifelong dream of becoming an idol due to this one flaw, he was preparing for a different path in life when a miracle suddenly appeared! "I'll become a superstar brighter than anyone." His once lacking dance skills were no longer a problem. The UV Starship. Five perfectly prepared idols are finally ready with everything they need. A monstrous rookie is about to debut in the entertainment industry! Presenting 'The New Black.' This life, he's destined to be a cosmic superstar!

altTitles.th: เทพยุทธ์พลิกลิขิตสวรรค์

description.en:
In this world, respect is earned with martial arts. Weak martial artists have strengths of tens of thousands of pounds, capable of cracking boulders. And the strong ones can cut off rivers and split mountains. There are even martial kings who know everything and can travel across the universe. Martial art decides your fate as well as your life and death. The weak is humiliated while the strong looks down on the world. This is a a world where the strong bullies the weak. People's statuses are decided by the levels of their cultivation of martial arts. Each faction fights for the title of "The Strongest". Only the strong ones have the right to survive. Even if you are from the same clan or faction, if you are weak, then you will be bullied and kicked out without mercy.  
  
After a car accident, Lin Feng crosses over to this new world into the body of a young master from the powerful Lin Family.  
Will Lin Feng be used by others again or will he forge his own path in this place where, regardless of your family ties or sect, only the strong have the right to live.  


---
description.fr: Dans ce monde, le respect se gagne avec les arts martiaux. Les artistes martiaux faibles ont des forces de dizaines de milliers de pounds, capables de craquer des blocs rocheux. Et les plus forts peuvent couper les rivières et creuser des montagnes. Il y a même des rois martiaux qui savent tout et peuvent voyager à travers l'univers. L'art martial décide de votre destin ainsi que de votre vie et de votre mort. Les faibles sont humiliés tandis que les forts méprisent tout le monde. C'est un monde où les forts intimident les faibles. Les statuts des gens sont déterminés par les niveaux de culture des arts martiaux. Chaque faction se bat pour le titre du "plus fort". Seuls les forts ont le droit de survivre. Même si vous appartenez au même clan ou à la même faction, si vous êtes faible, alors vous serez persécuté et expulsé sans pitié.
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, o respeito é obtido através das artes marciais. A força de artistas marciais fracos é igual a dezenas de milhares de libras, capazes de quebrar rochas. E os fortes podem cortar rios e dividir montanhas. Há até reis marciais que conhecem tudo e podem viajar pelo universo. A arte marcial decide seu destino, bem como sua vida e sua morte. Os fracos são humilhados enquanto o olhar forte para o mundo. Este é um mundo onde os fortes intimidam os fracos. O status das pessoas é decidido pelos níveis de cultivo de artes marciais. Cada facção luta pelo título de "O mais poderoso". Apenas os fortes têm o direito de sobreviver. Mesmo se você é do mesmo clã ou facção, se você é fraco, então você será intimidado e expulso sem piedade.

title.en: Ore to Kawazu-san no Isekai Hourouki

altTitles.id: Cerita Petualanganku di Dunia Lain bersama Kawazu-san

altTitles.en: Chronicles of My Adventures in Another World With Kawazu-san

altTitles.fr: Le récit de mes aventures dans un nouveau monde avec Kawazu-san

altTitles.fa: گزارش ماجراهای من با جناب کاوازو در دنیایی دیگر

altTitles.ja: 俺と蛙さんの異世界放浪記

altTitles.zh: 我和青蛙的异世界流浪记
我和青蛙的異世界流浪記

description.en:
Tarou was an ordinary university student until a strange old magician summoned him to another world, upon learning that his magical power is 8 million, he uses that abnormally powerful magic to revive the old man that caused all this… In the form of a frog. Thus begin the strange adventures of a boy with ridiculous magical power and Kawazu, the former strongest magician, now revived as a frog.  
  
Artist Twitter:  
 [@kasa\_7](https://twitter.com/kasa_7)
The fun and marvelous daily life of a young couple after meeting mysterious children who found their way to them.
description.ko:
숲속의 젊은 부부와 어느 날 그들에게 찾아온
정체불명의 아이들이 만들어가는 즐겁고 신묘한 일상
description.zh:
渴望拥有孩子的年轻夫妇，
突降长着老虎耳朵的萌娃！
很久以前在一座村庄里，从小青梅竹马的他们长大后顺理成章结为了夫妇。但结婚多年却一直没有孩子，尝试了各种“良药”后无果，最终找到了隔壁村传闻很厉害的神算子告诉他们需要搬家到山林里。某天突然家里出来了两个来历不明的小孩！好像还长着老虎的耳朵和尾巴？！

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/HEALING/laohulaile/list?title_no=1852)

---

- [Original Book <Yes24>](http://www.yes24.com/Product/Goods/103632508)

- [Original Book <Aladin>](https://www.aladin.co.kr/shop/wproduct.aspx?ItemId=279309005)

altTitles.ja: インソムニア

description.en: 20 nights, 20 terrifying stories. Masaya Hokazono tells us the horrific stories he has experienced as well as those that have been told to him. Even in a technologically advanced modern Japan, traditional spirits never cease to torment the living.
description.ja:
赤い妹・ネットの妖怪・宇宙人・電車を徘徊する女・深夜のコンビニに集まる亡者たちがあなたを今夜も“インソムニア(不眠症)”にする！

外薗昌也待望のホラー短編集!

altTitles.en: Embodiment of the Assassin in the Murim World

description.en:
The No.1 Hitman, Kim Gun, finds himself plunged into the world of martial arts due to a mysterious accident. To return to his original world, he must complete a mission called 'Martial Arts Conquest.'

With a total of 2 guns, Kim Gun's adventure to subdue the unfamiliar martial arts world begins.
description.ko:
No.1 킬러 김건은 의문의 사고로 무림 세계에 빠지게 되고
원래 있던 지구로 돌아가기 위해서는 '무림 제패'라는 임무를 완수해야 한다는 것을 알게 된다.

총 2자루와 함께 낯선 무림이란 세계를 평정하기 위한 김건의 모험이 시작된다.

title.en: The Dang Clan’s Swordmaster Heir Just Wants a Normal Life

altTitles.en: Becoming the Swordmaster Rank Young Lord of the Sichuan Tang Family
He Became the Head of the Four Heavenly Dang Family
Becoming the Sacheon Dang's Swordsmaster-Rank Young Lord
Became a swordsman-level Sogami of the Sacheondang family

description.en: The Dang clan of Sacheon, once renowned for its poison and hidden weapons, is now on the path to its demise. That is, until Yeonmyeung Dang, an outcast boy of the clan, awakens by recollecting the memories of his past life as the 'god of swords' who devoted his life to mastering the sword. Will the boy be able to protect his family and fulfill his dream of living a normal life?
description.ko:
독과 암기의 명가였지만 지금은 몰락해버린 사천당가.
그곳에서 태어난 당연명은 문득 검에 미쳐 살며
검신의 경지에 이르렀던 전생을 각성한다.

'이번 생은 평범하게 살고 싶다.'

평범하게 살려면, 역시 검술 실력은 숨겨야겠지.
그런데 방해하는 것들이 너무 많다.

title.en: Doushitara Osananajimi ♀️ no Kanojo ni Naremasu Ka!?

altTitles.ja: どうしたら幼馴染♀の彼女になれますか！？

altTitles.en: How Do I Get Together With My Childhood Friend?

altTitles.id: Gimana Caranya Agar Aku Bisa Jadi Pacarnya Teman Masa Kecil ♀ Ku?

altTitles.en: How Do I Turn My Best Friend Into My Girlfriend?

altTitles.ko: 어떻게 해야 소꿉친구의 여친이 될 수 있나요?!

altTitles.zh: 怎样才能成为发小的女友呢！？

description.en: High schoolers Minami Ikoma and Yuzu Makita have been childhood friends since grade school. Since their parents are friends, they have always been together. However, as Minami sees her friend get confessed to, feelings in her own heart start to sprout. A romantic comedy of two childhood friend starts.
description.id: Siswa sekolah menengah Minami Ikoma dan Yuzu Makita telah menjadi teman masa kecil sejak sekolah dasar. Karena orang tua mereka berteman, mereka selalu bersama. Namun, saat Minami melihat temannya ditembak, perasaan di hatinya sendiri mulai tumbuh. Sebuah komedi romantis dari dua teman masa kecil dimulai.

altTitles.ja: 河合ふるすろっとる！

description.en: Kawai, an emotional, quirky, and somewhat twisted elementary school girl, accidentally lets her classmate Takenouchi witness one of her most embarrassing moments. But somehow, this awkward incident leads to an unexpected friendship between the two. Watch as these two, far from your typical elementary school kids, engage in lively, heartfelt conversations in this heartwarming comedy!

altTitles.ja: カタブツ系女子に告白してみた

altTitles.en: I Tried Confessing My Love to a Serious Girl

description.en: Although she's pretty, she's widely rumoured to be the school's number one straight-laced girl. So when I gathered up my courage to confess to her…‽
description.ja: 美人だけど学校一『カタブツ』だと噂の女子に勇気を出して告白すると…!?

title.en: Senmetsumadou no Saikyou Kenja: Musai no Kenja, Madou wo Kiwame Saikyou e Itaru

altTitles.ja: 殲滅魔導の最強賢者
殲滅魔導の最強賢者　無才の賢者、魔導を極め最強へ至る

altTitles.en: The Strongest Sage: The Story of a Talentless Man Who Mastered Magic and Became the Best

description.en:
The world's strongest magician who carries "the crest least suitable for battle" searches for companions to fight together. The ones fit to be his companions would be…?!  
One more otherworld "crest" fantasy gets turned into a manga!!

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

altTitles.zh-ro: Sanguozhi Qunxiongzhuan: Huo Feng Liao Yuan

altTitles.zh-hk: 三国志群雄伝火鳳燎原

altTitles.ja: 火鳳燎原

altTitles.de: The Ravages of Time: Die Geschichte der Drei Reiche

description.en:
Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.  
  
Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!

altTitles.en: I Want to be Teased by a Cute Junior

altTitles.ja: かわいい後輩に言わされたい

altTitles.zh-hk: 可愛後輩想讓我說出口

altTitles.pt-br: Eu quero ser provocado por uma kouhai fofa

description.en: Yasu likes his kouhai, Moriyama, who is at the same time extremely assertive, deadpan, and extremely passive aggressive.
description.pt-br: Yasu gosta da sua kouhai, Moriyama, que é ao mesmo tempo extremamente assertiva, inexpressiva e extremamente passiva-agressiva.
